actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for certain inspections with respect to small farms.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Labor, under the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970, to conduct an inspection or investigation of an employee accidental death on a farming operation that neither maintains a temporary labor camp nor has more than ten employees. Authorizes the use of Occupational Safety and Health Administration funds for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide for certain inspections with respect to small farms.
